markdownRemark.html:
download opencv create dir exe install visual studio code setup environmental variables

run cmd as admin setx -m OPENCV_DIR “C:\Program Files\CMake\OpenCV\Build\x64\vc14”

install links https://my.visualstudio.com/Downloads?q=Visual%20Studio%202015%20with%20Update%203 https://sourceforge.net/projects/opencvlibrary/files/opencv-win/

sources https://docs.opencv.org/master/d3/d52/tutorial_windows_install.html
